posts.post_title: FS: T206 PSA 4 Green Cobb Sweet Corporal
posts.post_content:
T206 Sweet Corporal 150/30 T206 PSA 4   

Very Nicely Centered

Will bring to the National to trade or sell if cant sell it here   This is not the same T206 Green Cobb I had listed  earlier.  It centered even better

Perhaps I can consign to a Dealer at the National as well as I will be there Fri-Sat.

PM me with email for photo etc.    I will also attach a photo here when get a chance.



I can provide references of high dollar purchases and sales to members of this board.

posts.post_title: I had 17 of these at one time and...........
posts.post_content: this is about as nice as a true 4 will ever get, good luck.

last call to try to sell on net54 .. this is the only bump....

Sold for Cash to buyer who will pay at the National $4000
